description: Get new chat list for follow step support test (free to use without chat)

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: The basic API system using to identify your permission to the api, please ask developer to get it

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The basic API system using to identify your permission to the api, please ask developer to get it

parameters.name: center
parameters.description: Specifies the starting point of data to return in the center of timeline

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: test_count
response_fields.description: Total number of new chat (field name remained integer_id)
